text: And he said to him, Say now to her, Behold, thou hast 4. 13 Gr. been astonished with all this astonishment.taken all this trouble for us; what should I do for thee? Hast thou any 4. 13 Gr. word or business.request to make to the king, or to the captain of the host? And she said, I dwell in the midst of my people.
